sentences.sentence: It was childish nonsense—the chimera of frazzled ganglia.
sentences.translation: 那是幼稚的废话——疲倦的神经节的嵌合体。

sentences.sentence: So did the dorsal root ganglia in situ as the sclerotome in situ.
sentences.translation: 背根神经节原位也就是硬核刀原位。

sentences.sentence: Acetylcholine is also the principal neurotransmitter in all autonomic ganglia.
sentences.translation: 乙酰胆碱也是所有自主神经节的主要神经递质。
